issue-remark.remark: THOM 23-JUL-2015 20:11:08 [ips approval] We have uploaded files Editorial ftp site for your kind approval with following query.1. Do we need to set Sponsors and exhibitors and ETS_2016_Advert in color for print, If so, kindly update the IPS for color information.2. As per the doc file received to change the Editorial title to 11th ETS Special Issue of Reproductive Toxicology, we have removed the earlier text and replaced with the given title. Update IPS for same.3. As per marking received to Set the title, author and affiliation to whole width of text for all abstract. This is not possible as at issue stage crossmark logo has to be inserted beside the title.4. In article 7158 abstract E1 has to be removed. Kindly remove the duckling information for the IPS as well. Thanks
issue-remark.response:
SAIKIAP 24-JUL-2015 07:06 Please find my response below: [ips approval] We have uploaded files Editorial ftp site for your kind approval with following query.
1. Do we need to set Sponsors and exhibitors and ETS_2016_Advert in color for print, If so, kindly update the IPS for color information. Response � IPS updated.
2. As per the doc file received to change the Editorial title to 11th ETS Special Issue of Reproductive Toxicology, we have removed the earlier text and replaced with the given title. Update IPS for same. Response � IPS updated. But please retain text �Welcome!� immediately below the new title �11th ETS Special Issue of Reproductive Toxicology�
3. As per marking received to Set the title, author and affiliation to whole width of text for all abstract. This is not possible as at issue stage crossmark logo has to be inserted beside the title. Response � Ok. Please ignore the correction.
4. In article 7158 abstract E1 has to be removed. Kindly remove the duckling information for the IPS as well. Thanks Response - Updated

issue-remark.remark: THOM 23-JUL-2015 20:10:10 [ips approval] We have uploaded files Editorial ftp site for your kind approval with following query.1. Do we need to set Sponsors and exhibitors and ETS_2016_Advert in color for print, If so, kindly update the IPS for color information.2. As per the doc file received to change the Editorial title to 11th ETS Special Issue of Reproductive Toxicology, we have removed the earlier text and replaced with the given title. Update IPS for same.3. As per marking received to Set the title, author and affiliation to whole width of text for all abstract. This is not possible as at issue stage crossmark logo has to be inserted beside the title.4. In article 7158 abstract E1 has to be removed. Kindly remove the duckling information for the IPS as well. Thanks

SAIKIAP 21-JUL-2015 04:47:20 Corrections have been uploaded in validated items for the issue materials. Please note that there are corrections for the abstract items RTX 7153, RTX 7154, RTX 7155, RTX 7156, RTX 7158, RTX 7159 and RTX_7157. Please make all the corrections and proceed with delivering the S300 and F300 files. The print files need to be delivered by July 23, 2015.
DASHM 18-JUL-2015 06:27:45 IPS has been updated; content pages added iv to viii and rest accordingly.
SAIKIAP 16-JUL-2015 08:32:57 Please make the corrections uploaded as 'cover-inside.pdf' in P0.

SAIKIAP 14-JUL-2015 11:37:26 Please print 200 copies of this issue in addition to the base print run. It has to reach the following address on or before 14th August 2015.
